util::DbObj

util::DbObj Class Reference

It represents the sort of objects we deal with in the BtreeFile. This is analogous to a DBT in the Berkeley DB package. More...

#include <DbObj.h>

Detailed Description

It represents the sort of objects we deal with in the BtreeFile. This is analogous to a DBT in the Berkeley DB package.
